issue.title: Add buoyancy forces to dock elements

content.raw:
Did a quick prototype in [floating\_docks branch](#!/osrf/vrx/branch/floating_docks).  Buoyancy plugin works with dock elements \(1x1, 2x2, etc.\), but combining these elements into a full dock \(e.g., dock\_2016 or dock\_2018\) will required assembling the non-static elements with appropriate joints - including the placards.

Current demo…

```
wave_gazebo ocean_demos.launch world:=ocean_docks.world 
```
content.html:
Did a quick prototype in floating_docks branch. Buoyancy plugin works with dock elements (1x1, 2x2, etc.), but combining these elements into a full dock (e.g., dock_2016 or dock_2018) will required assembling the non-static elements with appropriate joints - including the placards.

Current demo…

wave_gazebo ocean_demos.launch world:=ocean_docks.world
